name: Joe's Daily Struggle
description:
Try to get through the day as Joseph Average without getting distracted from the main task. You won't be able to hang out with your friends at the end of the day if you're late, after all!

---------------------

This game shows how easy it is to get distracted across multiple real-life reminiscent situations.

The main character, Joseph Average, easily becomes distracted and constantly postpones important activities. Across various levels, the player - you - will try to help Joe focus and achieve a few every-day tasks. 

This game is based on a completion-content tradeoff,  since gaining the achievements will not require you to explore all content. On the contrary, you get rewarded for staying on track... If you can, that is.

But keep in mind: if you want to explore all of the content, you'll have to get distracted!

----------------------

Made by:

Simon Frühauf
